messages.content: ComfyUI-NodeReset is an extension for ComfyUI that allows resetting a node's inputs to their default values.
To use ComfyUI-NodeReset, right-click any node and choose 'Reset' from the context menu.
To install ComfyUI-NodeReset, clone the repository into your 'custom_nodes' folder using 'git clone https://github.com/BlakeOne/ComfyUI-NodeReset' and reload ComfyUI.
What does the 'Reset' option in the context menu do in ComfyUI-NodeReset?
The 'Reset' option in the context menu of ComfyUI-NodeReset resets the selected node's inputs to their default values.
Is ComfyUI-NodeReset a custom node or an extension in ComfyUI?
ComfyUI-NodeReset is an extension for ComfyUI, not a custom node.
Where should you clone the ComfyUI-NodeReset repository?
You should clone the ComfyUI-NodeReset repository into your 'custom_nodes' folder.
Do you need to reload ComfyUI after installing ComfyUI-NodeReset?
Yes, you need to reload ComfyUI after installing ComfyUI-NodeReset.
